verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2540>season<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G4198>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4702>grainfields<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G3983>hungry<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G5089>pluck<s%> <S%G4719>ears<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%>.

But the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G1161>when<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2036>it<s%>, said unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> it <S%G1832>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G1722>upon<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Have <S%G314>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G3983>hungry<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they that <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>;

how <S%G4459><s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5315>ate<s%> <S%G740>the<s%> <S%G740>showbread<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> for them that <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>but<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G3361>for<s%> the <S%G2409>priests<s%>?

Or <S%G2228><s%> have <S%G314>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> the <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G953>profane<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G338>guiltless<s%>?
But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> one greater <S%G3187>than<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye had <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> this <S%G2076>meaneth<s%>, I <S%G2309>desire<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%>, <S%G2613>ye<s%> <S%G302>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> have <S%G2613>condemned<s%> the <S%G338>guiltless<s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G2258>a<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> having <S%G2192>a<s%> <S%G3584>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>saying<s%>, Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G2323>heal<s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>? <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>perceiving<s%> it <S%G402>withdrew<s%> from <S%G1564>thence<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>,
and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2008>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G4160>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5318>known<s%>:
that <S%G3704><s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G140>chosen<s%>; <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> is well <S%G2106>pleased<s%>: I will <S%G5087>put<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> he shall <S%G518>declare<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>.
